name: New Myspace Dark (Red/Black)
description: A red and black theme for New Myspace.(Updates Uncertain, PM here or on Myspace with problems.) #Looking for a White theme? Check -This- one out.
additional_info:
(Update 9/6/16)
*Slight update for site styling changes.

(Update 5/4/16)
*A few misc fixes(detail on ms light page).
*Added support for "artist profile widget" and partial for video pages.

(Update 4/1/15)
*Several small fixes.
*Ads opt-out page fix.
*Sorted several of the longer lists.

(Update 8/3/14)
*Cleaned up Discover Videos.

(Update 7/23/14)
*Radio discover search box changed to better match default.
*Featured article fixes.

(Update 7/15/14)
*Fixed radio discover search box.

(Update 7/09/14)
*A few small changes to color errors, updated picture to reflect this.
*Significant color fix for history page.
*Fixed stock history search box height.
*Save queue page updated.
*Various small fixes.

(Update 7/01/14)
*Re-added filters.

(Update 6/28/14)
*Fixed many buttons. 

(Update 5/20/14)
*Fixed footer after nms update.

(Update 4/15/14)
*Fixed login page colors.
